title: #236: Our Genetically Modified Future
description:
The loosening of regulation on genetic research is opening the door to more nefarious ways to tinker with Mother Nature, and the general public is being kept in the dark about the very real dangers that could be unleashed.

As more and more people (and countries) come to the realization that Genetically Modified Organisms are dangerous for human consumption, those involved in their production have introduced a new tactic that hopes to get them around all of the regulations and legalities by tweaking the process and pivoting to their new buzzword: Gene-Edited.

Not much is currently known about the long-term effects on the human body from eating gene-edited foods, but that doesn’t really matter much because the organizations behind their push are also the same ones quietly rolling out the depopulation agenda. If there is one thing that we do know for certain it’s that the Mainstream Media will do their part to sell the lie of safety to the dumbed-down general public.
